alert.note: Alert for Chiricahua Mountains including Chiricahua National Monument; Dragoon, Mule, Huachuca and Santa Rita Mountains including Bisbee, Canelo Hills, Madera Canyon; Eastern Cochise County Below 5000 Feet including Douglas, Willcox (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 5:16PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Cochise County through 600 PM MST... At 516 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles southeast of Willcox, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Willcox, Pearce-Sunsites, Cochise and Kansas Settlement. This includes the following highways... Route 181 between mile markers 47 and 48. Route 186 between mile markers 327 and 351. Route 191 between mile markers 48 and 63. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Chiricahua Mountains including Chiricahua National Monument; Dragoon, Mule, Huachuca and Santa Rita Mountains including Bisbee, Canelo Hills, Madera Canyon; Eastern Cochise County Below 5000 Feet including Douglas, Willcox
